Name: Battle Imagine - Goblin Wind Mage
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade the Battle Imagine skill of Goblin Wind Mage - Stunt! Wind Shadow Silence.

Stunt! Wind Shadow Silence
Resonate with the power of Elite Goblin Wind Mage, dealing Attack Damage in a fan-shaped area in front and silencing the target.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
